title: Gotta Get Away from Gravity
description: Earth is getting bored with the planetary lineup in the solar system and imagines what it would be like to roam the galaxy and beyond. Gotta Get Away from Gravity is a charming play that introduces students to the important role that gravity plays in our solar system as well as the unique characteristics of the planets that make up our solar system. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast and to identify and use contractions.
highFrequencyWords: axis, develop, force, galaxy, gravity, solar system
